original: @25b * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang po 'bring gis /
analyzed: @25b * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang po 'bring gis /
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: rten 'brel bcu gnyis bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: rten 'brel bcu gnyis bsgom pa ni /
translated: For those of middling faculties, the cultivation of the twelve links of dependent origination is as follows.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rten 'brel bcu gnyis gsungs te /🔽phyi rten cing 'brel pa'i 'byung ba sa bon skye bo nad med pas 'bras bu'i bar du yan lag brgyad kyi tshul du 'byung ba 'bras bu ljang bu la gzigs nas /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rten 'brel bcu gnyis gsungs te / phyi rten cing 'brel pa'i 'byung ba sa bon skye bo nad med pas 'bras bu'i bar du yan lag brgyad kyi tshul du 'byung ba 'bras bu ljang bu la gzigs nas /
translated: The perfect, fully enlightened Buddha taught the twelve links of dependent origination.

original: nang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar du yan lag bcu gnyis gsungs te /
analyzed: nang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar du yan lag bcu gnyis gsungs te /
translated: He taught the outer dependent origination, which arises in the manner of eight branches from the seed of the outer elements, up to the fruit, and he taught the inner dependent origination, which arises in the manner of twelve branches from ignorance up to aging and death.

original: nang gi chos rnams ji ltar skye ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams bstan pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi chos rnams ji ltar skye ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams bstan pa'o //
translated: He taught the causes and results of the arising of inner phenomena.

original: de la ma rig pa ni mi shes pa las byung ste /
analyzed: de la ma rig pa ni mi shes pa las byung ste /
translated: Ignorance arises from non-understanding.

original: de kho na nyid la gti mug pa dang / las rgyu dang 'bras bul gti mug pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid la gti mug pa dang / las rgyu dang 'bras bul gti mug pa'o //
translated: It is the delusion regarding suchness and the delusion regarding the causes and results of karma.

original: de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa 'byung ste /
translated: Because of that, ignorance arises.

original: de la ci'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ci'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called ignorance?

original: mun pa chen po'i phyir na ma rig pa ste /🔽dper na mun pas @26a * //
analyzed: mun pa chen po'i phyir na ma rig pa ste / dper na mun pas @26a * //
translated: Because it is great darkness.

original: bsgribs nas rdzas kyi dngos po mi mthong ba dang 'dra bar ma rig pas kyang las dang las kyi 'bras bu yod pa dang / bden pa dang dkon mchog yon tan can dang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid stong pa nyid du mthong bar bya ba bsgribs te ma mthong bas mun pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: bsgribs nas rdzas kyi dngos po mi mthong ba dang 'dra bar ma rig pas kyang las dang las kyi 'bras bu yod pa dang / bden pa dang dkon mchog yon tan can dang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid stong pa nyid du mthong bar bya ba bsgribs te ma mthong bas mun pa zhes bya ste /
translated: For example, just as when something is obscured by darkness, the substance is not seen, in the same way, because of ignorance, the existence of karma and the result of karma, the truth, the qualities of the jewels, and the emptiness of the reality of phenomena are obscured and not seen. Therefore, it is called darkness.

original: kha cig gis dge sdig ngo ma shes //
analyzed: kha cig gis dge sdig ngo ma shes //
translated: Some do not understand virtue and nonvirtue.

original: kha cig gis dge sdig yod par yid ches kyang don la rmongs pas ma rig pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: kha cig gis dge sdig yod par yid ches kyang don la rmongs pas ma rig pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Some believe that virtue and nonvirtue exist, but because they are confused about the meaning, it is called ignorance.

original: de'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'byung ste /
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'byung ste /
translated: Because of that, formation arises.

original: bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin da dang / mi g-yo ba gsum gyis 'du byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin da dang / mi g-yo ba gsum gyis 'du byed pa'o //
translated: It is formed by the three: merit, demerit, and unwavering.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir na 'du byed rnams zhes bya ste /
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir na 'du byed rnams zhes bya ste /
translated: Because they form, they are called formations.

original: las su ma bstan pa rnams pa sna tshogs pa 'du byed do //
analyzed: las su ma bstan pa rnams pa sna tshogs pa 'du byed do //
translated: They are the various kinds of karma that are not revealed.

original: des byas pas kun gzhi la bag chags sogs te /
analyzed: des byas pas kun gzhi la bag chags sogs te /
translated: Because of that, the latent propensities are placed in the foundation consciousness.

original: rgyu des rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rgyu des rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo //
translated: Because of that cause, consciousness arises.

original: des khams gsum du las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i las kyi 'du byed do ;
analyzed: des khams gsum du las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i las kyi 'du byed do ;
translated: Because of that, virtuous and nonvirtuous karma and karma that is not revealed are formed in the three realms.

original: / ma rig pa dang 'du byed gnyis ni tshe snga ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: / ma rig pa dang 'du byed gnyis ni tshe snga ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: Ignorance and formations are connected to the previous life.

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
translated: The condition of formations gives rise to consciousness.

original: ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it called consciousness?

original: phyi nang gi chos gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs pa yul tha dad pa rnams la mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas so sor rig cing shes pas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: phyi nang gi chos gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs pa yul tha dad pa rnams la mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas so sor rig cing shes pas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Because the eye consciousness and so on individually cognize and know the different objects of outer and inner phenomena, such as form, sound, smell, and so on, it is called consciousness.

original: kun gzhi la bag chags gzhag pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu des 'phangs nas /
analyzed: kun gzhi la bag chags gzhag pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu des 'phangs nas /
translated: Because of the cause of the latent propensities that place latent propensities in the foundation,

original: pha rol du skad cig ma'i tshul gyis ma'i mngal du chags pa las ming dang gzugs su gyur ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol du skad cig ma'i tshul gyis ma'i mngal du chags pa las ming dang gzugs su gyur ba'o //
translated: The other is the name-and-form that arises in the mother’s womb by the method of the instant of death.

original: rnam par shes pa man chad da lta'i tshe ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa man chad da lta'i tshe ste /
translated: Consciousness up to this point is the present life.

original: de yan chad gsum ni 'phen pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: de yan chad gsum ni 'phen pa'i yan lag go //
translated: From this point on, the three are the projecting member.🔽The name-and-form that is the condition of that is the supported member.

original: de'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs te ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs te ci'i phyir na /
translated: Why is it called name-and-form?

original: brten pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: brten pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste /
translated: It is called name-and-form because it is supported.

original: dpen na shing gsum rtse sprad na mdung khyim du rung ba dang 'dra ba'i ming bzhi'i phung po dang gzugs kyi phung po gnyis kyang gcig la gcig brten pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste /
analyzed: dpen na shing gsum rtse sprad na mdung khyim du rung ba dang 'dra ba'i ming bzhi'i phung po dang gzugs kyi phung po gnyis kyang gcig la gcig brten pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste /
translated: Just as when three sticks are tied together with a string, they can be used as a spear, so the four name aggregates and the form aggregate are called name-and-form because they support each other.

original: rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du 'ongs nas ming bzhi'i phung po dang gzugs kyi phung po mer mer po dang / nur nur bo dang / gor gor po dang / yan lag tu gyur /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du 'ongs nas ming bzhi'i phung po dang gzugs kyi phung po mer mer po dang / nur nur bo dang / gor gor po dang / yan lag tu gyur /
translated: When consciousness enters the mother’s womb, the four name aggregates and the form aggregate are the kalala, arbuda, peśin, and ghana stages, and the limbs are formed.

original: 'phrad 'gyur la sogs pa mngal gyi chos drug dang ldan no //
analyzed: 'phrad 'gyur la sogs pa mngal gyi chos drug dang ldan no //
translated: They are endowed with the six dharmas of the womb, such as contact, and so on.

original: de'i rkyen gyis skye mched drug 'byung ste /
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis skye mched drug 'byung ste /
translated: The six sense spheres arise due to that.

original: sems dang sems @26b las byung ba rnams skye ba 'am 'byung ba'i sgo byed pas sgo zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sems dang sems @26b las byung ba rnams skye ba 'am 'byung ba'i sgo byed pas sgo zhes bya ste /
translated: The six sense spheres are called doors because they are the doors or the means for the arising or occurrence of minds and mental factors.

original: dngos su na ming dang gzugs mer mer po la sogs pa brtan nas de'i rkyen gyis nang gi dbang po drug dod pa las yul drug la rnam shes skye shing mched pas so //
analyzed: dngos su na ming dang gzugs mer mer po la sogs pa brtan nas de'i rkyen gyis nang gi dbang po drug dod pa las yul drug la rnam shes skye shing mched pas so //
translated: In actuality, the six sense spheres are the six inner sense faculties that develop from the stable state of name and form such as the kalala and so on and due to their condition, consciousness arises and expands in relation to the six objects.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Contact arises due to the condition of consciousness.

original: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'dus pas yul yid du 'ong ba dang / mi 'ong ba dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa dang gang dang gang la reg pa'i rgyu tshor ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: yul dang dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'dus pas yul yid du 'ong ba dang / mi 'ong ba dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa dang gang dang gang la reg pa'i rgyu tshor ba zhes bya ste /
translated: Contact is the cause of feeling, since the meeting of object, faculty and consciousness causes the feeling of pleasant, unpleasant and neutral objects.

original: reg pa 'byung ba'i rgyu tshor ba ste nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: reg pa 'byung ba'i rgyu tshor ba ste nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: Feeling is the cause of contact and is the experience of contact.

original: 'di man chad bzhi ni 'phangs pa'i lam gyi yan lag go //
analyzed: 'di man chad bzhi ni 'phangs pa'i lam gyi yan lag go //
translated: The four from feeling onward are the projected path factors.

original: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa 'byung ste /
translated: Craving arises due to the condition of feeling.

original: ci'i phyir na skom pa'i phyir na sred pa zhes bya ste /🔽skom gyis gdungs pa dang 'dra bar tshor ba sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba dang phrad par 'dod pas srid pa'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir na skom pa'i phyir na sred pa zhes bya ste / skom gyis gdungs pa dang 'dra bar tshor ba sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba dang phrad par 'dod pas srid pa'o //
translated: Why is it called craving? It is called craving because of thirst.🔽Like one tormented by thirst, one craves for the feeling of pleasure when separated from the feeling of pain.

original: bde ba tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa chang 'thung ste /
analyzed: bde ba tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa chang 'thung ste /
translated: Craving is like drinking alcohol, because of the condition of the feeling of pleasure.

original: yang dang yang du 'dod pa'i phyir srid pa'o //
analyzed: yang dang yang du 'dod pa'i phyir srid pa'o //
translated: One craves for pleasure again and again, and so there is existence.

original: 'di kun gyi rtsa ba ni ma rig pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di kun gyi rtsa ba ni ma rig pa las byung ba'o //
translated: The root of all this is ignorance.

original: srid pa sred pa len pa gsum da ltar gyi tshe dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: srid pa sred pa len pa gsum da ltar gyi tshe dang sbyar ro //
translated: The three of craving, grasping and existence are applied to the present life.

original: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa 'byung ste /
translated: The condition of craving gives rise to grasping.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it called grasping?

original: nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa zhes bya ste /
translated: It is called grasping because of appropriation.

original: len pa la bzhi ste 'dod pa'i len pa dang / lta ba'i len pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i len pa dang / bdag tu lta ba'i len pa'o //
analyzed: len pa la bzhi ste 'dod pa'i len pa dang / lta ba'i len pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i len pa dang / bdag tu lta ba'i len pa'o //
translated: There are four kinds of grasping: grasping at desire, grasping at views, grasping at morality and asceticism, and grasping at the belief in a self.

original: srid pa'i rgyu yang dang yang du len par byed de /
analyzed: srid pa'i rgyu yang dang yang du len par byed de /
translated: One appropriates the cause of existence again and again.

original: 'di yang rtsa ba ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang rtsa ba ma rig pa'o //
translated: This is also the root ignorance.

original: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ste /
translated: The condition of grasping is the arising of existence.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: srid par skye ba'i phyir srid pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: srid par skye ba'i phyir srid pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Because of birth in existence, it is called existence.

original: khams gsum du skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khams gsum du skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of birth in the three realms.

original: der skye ba'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags brtas nas tshe phyi ma'i skye ba ni sred pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: der skye ba'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags brtas nas tshe phyi ma'i skye ba ni sred pa zhes bya ste /
translated: The cause of birth there is the growth of the latent tendencies of karma and afflictions, and birth in the next life is called craving.

original: len pa'i rgyu las dge ba dang / mi dge ba bsags pas tshe phyi ma len pas srid pa'o //
analyzed: len pa'i rgyu las dge ba dang / mi dge ba bsags pas tshe phyi ma len pas srid pa'o //
translated: Because of the cause of grasping, virtue and nonvirtue are accumulated, and existence is taken in the next life.

original: 'di man chad gsum ni grub pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: 'di man chad gsum ni grub pa'i yan lag go //
translated: From here on, the next three are the branches of establishment.

original: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste /
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste /
translated: The condition of existence is birth.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: phung po 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: phung po 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya ste /
translated: Because of the arising of the aggregates, it is called birth.

original: lam rgyud lnga nyid du lta dang mi la sogs pa'i lus kyi phung po sngon med pa 'byung bas na skye ba'o //
analyzed: lam rgyud lnga nyid du lta dang mi la sogs pa'i lus kyi phung po sngon med pa 'byung bas na skye ba'o //
translated: Because the aggregates of the body of humans and so on arise in the five classes of beings, it is birth.

original: de yang srid par skye ba'i las byas pa'i rgyus skye ba'o //
analyzed: de yang srid par skye ba'i las byas pa'i rgyus skye ba'o //
translated: Moreover, birth is due to the cause of karma that produces birth in existence.

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi 'byung ste /
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi 'byung ste /
translated: Aging and death occur due to the condition of birth.

original: ci'i phyir rgas pa zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rgas pa zhe na /
translated: Why is it called aging?

original: phung po smin pa'i phyir rgas pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: phung po smin pa'i phyir rgas pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Because the aggregates mature, it is called aging.

original: @27a * // dper na shing thog smin pa de rgas pa dang 'dra bar skra dkar dang gnyer ma can du gyur te /
analyzed: @27a * // dper na shing thog smin pa de rgas pa dang 'dra bar skra dkar dang gnyer ma can du gyur te /
translated: For example, like a fruit that is ripe, the hair turns white and wrinkles appear.

original: lus ni bshad khung bzhin du song //
analyzed: lus ni bshad khung bzhin du song //
translated: The body becomes like a dried up well.

original: kha brag phug stong pa dang 'dra /
analyzed: kha brag phug stong pa dang 'dra /
translated: It is like an empty cave.

original: skra spra ba'i me tog dang 'dra /
analyzed: skra spra ba'i me tog dang 'dra /
translated: It is like a flower of the ashwagandha plant.🔽The forehead becomes like an old chopping block.

original: dpral ba dras stan rnying pa dang 'dra bar song ba ni rgas pa'o //
analyzed: dpral ba dras stan rnying pa dang 'dra bar song ba ni rgas pa'o //
translated: This is aging.

original: rgas pa'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: rgas pa'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba 'byung ste /
translated: Death occurs due to the condition of aging.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it called death?

original: 'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba zhes bya ste /
translated: Because of destruction, it is called death.

original: lus kyi phung po gnas pa'i dus zad de drod dang rnam par shes pas btang ba'i phyir shi ba'o //
analyzed: lus kyi phung po gnas pa'i dus zad de drod dang rnam par shes pas btang ba'i phyir shi ba'o //
translated: Because the body's aggregates remain for a limited time and are abandoned by heat and consciousness, it is death.

original: skye ba yong na rga shi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: skye ba yong na rga shi 'byung ngo //
translated: If there is birth, aging and death occur.

original: skye ba dang rga shi gnyis te gsum ni tshe phyi ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: skye ba dang rga shi gnyis te gsum ni tshe phyi ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: Birth and aging and death are the three that apply to the next life.

original: rgas pa dang shi ba gnyis ni nyes dmigs kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: rgas pa dang shi ba gnyis ni nyes dmigs kyi yan lag go //
translated: Aging and death are the branches of the problem.

original: rten 'brel bcu gnyis dum bu lngas 'chad de /
analyzed: rten 'brel bcu gnyis dum bu lngas 'chad de /
translated: The twelve links of dependent origination are explained in five sections.

original: tshe snga ma'i rgyu'i sgo nas gzhag go //
analyzed: tshe snga ma'i rgyu'i sgo nas gzhag go //
translated: The first two links are posited from the point of view of the causes of the previous life.

original: da ltar gyi tshe ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i sgo nas gzhag go //
analyzed: da ltar gyi tshe ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i sgo nas gzhag go //
translated: The present life is posited from the point of view of both cause and effect.

original: de ltar ci'i phyir bstan ce na /🔽de yang tshe snga ma'i rgyus 'di bskyed /
analyzed: de ltar ci'i phyir bstan ce na / de yang tshe snga ma'i rgyus 'di bskyed /
translated: Why is it taught in this way?🔽The causes of the previous life give rise to this life.

original: 'di'i rgyus phyi ma skyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i rgyus phyi ma skyed pa'o //
translated: The causes of this life give rise to the next life.

original: de ltar yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba ni 'jug rga shi 'byung /
analyzed: de ltar yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba ni 'jug rga shi 'byung /
translated: Thus, the twelve links of dependent origination arise in sequence.

original: ci las byung rtsad bcad pas skye ba las byung /
analyzed: ci las byung rtsad bcad pas skye ba las byung /
translated: If one investigates from where they arise, they arise from birth.

original: de nas khad kyis gcig gi rkyen gyis gcig bskyed de /
analyzed: de nas khad kyis gcig gi rkyen gyis gcig bskyed de /
translated: Then, one by one, the conditions give rise to the next,

original: mjug ma rig pa la rtsa ba thug pa dang / ma rig pa de yang med par 'gags pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mjug ma rig pa la rtsa ba thug pa dang / ma rig pa de yang med par 'gags pa ma yin te /
translated: and in the end, ignorance is the root. That ignorance does not cease by becoming nothing or by not being observed.🔽It ceases by ceasing to be ignorance.

original: ma yin pa'am mi dmigs par 'gags pas 'du byed nas rga shi'i bar du 'gags te /
analyzed: ma yin pa'am mi dmigs par 'gags pas 'du byed nas rga shi'i bar du 'gags te /
translated: Thus, from formations up to aging and death cease.

original: lugs las bzlog par shes par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: lugs las bzlog par shes par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the understanding of the reversal of the sequence.

original: de ltar bdag gis 'di byas pa rang bzo lta bu ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis 'di byas pa rang bzo lta bu ma yin te /
translated: I have not composed this in the manner of an invention of my own.🔽It is based on the following passage:

original: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton //
translated: “The twelve links are the roots of existence,

original: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang //🔽zhes gsungs pa la brten nas byas pa'o //🔽slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa /
analyzed: dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang // zhes gsungs pa la brten nas byas pa'o // slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa /
translated: And they are also the twelve pure aspects.”

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so//
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so//
translated: The Instruction on the Meditation on the Twelve Links of Dependent Origination through the Practice of the Noble Nāgārjuna’s Praise of the Supramundane, Accomplished by the Master Mañjuśrīmitra, is now complete.
